text: Petere a tshwara segole ka seatla a se emisa ka dinao. Mme ya re a dira jalo, maoto a monna yoo le magwejana a fodisiwa a bo a nonotshiwa mo e leng gore o ne a ba a kgona go tlolaka, a ema foo lobakanyana mme a simolola go tsamaya! Mme a tsamaya a tlolaka a baka Modimo a tsena le bone mo Tempeleng.
